title: Coat
description: Coat (kaftan) of gold brocade with red ground. The gold is closely woven in diagonal stripes. Over the gold is brocaded, at close regular intervals, a green quatrefoil ornament with crimson center. Lined throughout with turkey red cotton. Standing collar. Coat buttons front to waist. Hangs free from waist, one side crossing under and tying on the hip. Slit pockets on hips. Straight pocket on left breast. Metal Cloth.
